Articles.Content:
Hey guys and gals,

Have been playing KSP for a little while now.

As of now I have 3 unmanned satellites in orbit and am trying to build a keo-network. I launhced these baby's attached to a manned module so i would have ample time to set it all up nice and sweet.

As i've launched my second keo-satelite, I seem to be unable to activate any of my antenna and link the two probes. Also, i cant seem to be able to activate SAS as well. I am however able to steer the vessel around using wasd.

I have an active connecting (green) with mission control, yet when i target my second satellite I'm not able to activate the antenna, which WAS possible when the manned module was attached.

What could be the problem here?

Thanks for any help!

 

Below: i need to connect scansat 2 to scansat 3. I can target, but I can't activate and deploy the antenna.

 

hmm, i had 2 screenshots which failed to upload
Sure you are not under time warp?
also restarted the game multiple times and tried in a new game.
noone has faced the same problem before?
